parameter.name: customerRef
parameter.description: Reference to a Customer or job.

parameter.name: customField
parameter.description: Custom field or data extension.

parameter.name: docNumber
parameter.description: Reference number for the transaction.

parameter.name: txnDate
parameter.description: The date entered by the user when this transaction occurred.

parameter.name: departmentRef
parameter.description: Location of the transaction, as defined using location tracking in QuickBooks Online.

parameter.name: currencyRef
parameter.description: Reference to the Currency in which all amounts on the associated transaction are expressed.

parameter.name: exchangeRate
parameter.description: Currency exchange rate.

parameter.name: privateNote
parameter.description: User entered, organization-private note about the transaction.

parameter.name: txnStatus
parameter.description: The values accepted are defined in QboEstimateStatusEnum.

parameter.name: linkedTxn
parameter.description: A linked (related) transaction. More than one transaction can be linked.

parameter.name: line
parameter.description: A line item of a transaction.

parameter.name: txnTaxDetail
parameter.description: Details of taxes charged on the transaction as a whole.

parameter.name: customerMemo
parameter.description: This is the user-entered message to the customer that does appear in the invoice, and does appear in the printed invoice.

parameter.name: billAddr
parameter.description: Bill-to address of the Invoice.

parameter.name: shipAddr
parameter.description: Identifies the address where the goods must be shipped.

parameter.name: classRef
parameter.description: Reference to the Class associated with the transaction.

parameter.name: salesTermRef
parameter.description: Reference to the SalesTerm associated with the transaction.

parameter.name: shipMethodRef
parameter.description: Reference to the ShipMethod associated with the transaction.

parameter.name: shipDate
parameter.description: Date for delivery of goods or services.

parameter.name: globalTaxCalculation
parameter.description: Method in which tax is applied.

parameter.name: totalAmt
parameter.description: Indicates the total amount of the transaction.

parameter.name: applyTaxAfterDiscount
parameter.description: If false or null, calculate the sales tax first, and then apply the discount.

parameter.name: printStatus
parameter.description: Printing status of the invoice.

parameter.name: emailStatus
parameter.description: Email status of the invoice.

parameter.name: billEmail
parameter.description: Identifies the e-mail address where the invoice is sent.

parameter.name: expirationDate
parameter.description: Date by which estimate must be accepted before invalidation.

parameter.name: acceptedBy
parameter.description: Name of customer who accepted the estimate.

parameter.name: acceptedDate
parameter.description: Date estimate was accepted.
